q: What is Angular?

options.text: A TypeScript-based framework for building web applications
options.exp: Angular es un framework basado en TypeScript para crear aplicaciones web SPA.

q: Which command is used to create a new Angular project?

options.exp: El comando estándar para iniciar un proyecto Angular es `ng new`.

q: Which file typically defines the root module of an Angular app?

options.exp: `AppModule` es el módulo raíz donde se bootstrap la aplicación.

q: What is the main difference between Angular and AngularJS?

options.text: Angular is TypeScript-based, AngularJS is JavaScript-based
options.exp: Angular moderno está escrito en TypeScript, AngularJS en JavaScript.

options.text: AngularJS supports components and Angular does not
Angular does not support data binding

q: Which decorator is used to define a component?

options.exp: El decorador @Component define metadatos de un componente Angular.

q: Which property in @Component defines the element name used in HTML?

options.exp: El selector es el tag HTML del componente.

q: Which binding uses `[( )]` syntax?

options.exp: La combinación banana in a box `[(ngModel)]` representa two-way binding.

q: Which decorator is used to receive data from a parent component?

options.exp: @Input permite recibir datos desde el componente padre.

q: Which decorator is used to emit events to a parent component?

options.exp: @Output se usa para emitir eventos al componente padre.

q: What does interpolation use in Angular templates?

options.exp: La interpolación usa llaves dobles para mostrar valores.

q: How do you create a signal?

options.exp: signal() crea un signal con un valor inicial.

q: Which method changes a signal's value?

options.exp: signal.set(newValue) modifica su valor.

q: What language is Angular mainly written in?

options.exp: Angular se basa en TypeScript.

q: Which keyword declares a variable with block scope in TypeScript?

options.exp: let permite alcance por bloque.

q: Which decorator marks a class as available for dependency injection?

options.exp: @Injectable indica que la clase puede ser inyectada como servicio.

q: How do you inject a service into a component?

options.exp: Angular inyecta servicios mediante el constructor.

options.text: Using an import in the template

q: What type of directive changes layout by adding/removing elements?

options.exp: Las directivas estructurales modifican el DOM.

q: Which directive is used to conditionally display elements?

options.exp: ngIf muestra u oculta un elemento dependiendo de la condición.

q: Which directive is used to iterate over a collection?

options.exp: ngFor repite un elemento basado en una colección.

q: Which component displays routed views?

options.exp: router-outlet es el punto donde se carga la vista del router.

q: Which directive is used for navigation in templates?

options.exp: routerLink genera enlaces manejados por el router.

q: Which feature protects routes based on conditions?

options.exp: Los guards restringen acceso a rutas basado en lógica.

q: Which pipe formats dates?

options.exp: El pipe date transforma valores a formato fecha.

q: Which pipe transforms text to uppercase?

options.exp: uppercase convierte texto a mayúsculas.

q: Which syntax applies parameters to a pipe?

options.exp: Los parámetros se pasan después del nombre del pipe separados por ':'

q: What is the key difference between template-driven and reactive forms?

options.text: Reactive forms are more scalable and use explicit form models
options.exp: Reactive forms se basan en un modelo creado en TS, son más robustas.

options.text: Template-driven forms do not support validation
Reactive forms do not use HTML templates
Template-driven forms are only for small apps

q: Which class represents a control in Angular forms?

options.exp: AbstractControl es la clase base para FormControl y FormGroup.

q: Which CSS class indicates a valid form control?

options.exp: Angular aplica ng-valid si el control es válido.

q: Which CSS class indicates a touched form control?

options.exp: ng-touched indica que el control ha sido enfocado y luego desenfocado.

q: Which property of @NgModule declares which components belong to the module?

options.exp: declarations lista los componentes, pipes y directivas del módulo.

q: Which property of @NgModule lists other modules needed?

options.exp: imports indica los módulos externos necesarios en el módulo.

q: Which property of @NgModule makes components available to other modules?

options.exp: exports permite usar componentes fuera del módulo actual.

q: Which operator applies a function to each emitted value?

options.exp: map transforma los valores emitidos por un observable.

q: Which operator filters emissions based on a condition?

options.exp: filter deja pasar solo los valores que cumplan la condición.

q: Which operator completes after the first emitted value?

options.exp: take(1) toma solo el primer valor y completa.

q: Which operator allows side effects without modifying values?

options.exp: tap permite ejecutar acciones secundarias sin modificar flujo.

q: Which file bootstraps the Angular application?

options.exp: main.ts arranca la aplicación cargando AppModule o un standalone root.

q: Which binding listens to events in Angular?

options.exp: Los paréntesis representan event binding, ej: (click).

q: Which binding sets properties on a DOM element?

options.exp: Los corchetes realizan property binding.

q: What is a service used for in Angular?

options.text: Share logic or data between components
options.exp: Los servicios centralizan lógica y datos compartidos.

q: Which Angular CLI command generates a service?

options.exp: ng g s genera un servicio.

q: What is a pipe used for?

options.text: Transform displayed data in the template
options.exp: Los pipes transforman valores mostrados.

q: Which of these is a built-in structural directive?

options.exp: ngFor es una directiva estructural para repetir elementos.

q: Which of the following is an attribute directive?

options.exp: ngClass modifica estilos sin alterar la estructura del DOM.

q: How do you declare a string in TypeScript using backticks?

options.exp: Los backticks permiten template strings con interpolación.

q: Which class is used to group multiple form controls?

options.exp: FormGroup organiza controles como una unidad.

q: Which one applies logic before navigating to a route?

options.exp: canActivate determina si una ruta se puede activar.

q: Which pipe handles Observable values automatically?

options.exp: async se suscribe y muestra el valor más reciente del observable.

q: Which structural directive is used to repeat elements?

options.exp: Sintaxis estándar de ngFor.

q: What does Angular CLI stand for?

options.exp: CLI significa Command Line Interface.

q: Which command serves the Angular application locally?

options.exp: ng serve inicia un servidor local para probar la aplicación.

q: What file defines global Angular project configuration?

options.exp: angular.json contiene configuraciones del proyecto.

q: What feature of Angular allows automatic UI updates when data changes?

options.exp: El data binding sincroniza datos y vista.

q: Which symbol allows event binding in a template?

options.exp: Los paréntesis representan binding de eventos.

q: In Angular, what is a Signal mainly used for?

options.exp: Las Signals permiten manejar estado reactivo sin Observables.

q: How do you read a signal's value?

options.text: Call it as a function, e.g., count()
options.exp: Los signals se leen usando llamada a función.

q: Which TypeScript keyword creates a read-only variable?

options.exp: const define valores que no pueden reasignarse.

q: Which TypeScript feature helps document types and prevent errors?

options.exp: Las anotaciones de tipos reducen errores de tiempo de ejecución.

q: How do you define a class in TypeScript?

options.exp: Sintaxis estándar para clases.

q: Why are services useful in Angular?

options.text: To share logic or data across multiple components
options.exp: Permiten desacoplar lógica del UI.

q: Where should reusable app-wide services be provided?

options.exp: Se hace usando providedIn: 'root'.

q: Which directive applies conditional CSS styles?

options.exp: ngStyle permite aplicar estilos dinámicos.

q: What is a RouterModule used for?

options.exp: RouterModule permite configurar rutas y navegación.

q: Which syntax defines a basic route?

options.exp: Sintaxis estándar de configuración de rutas.

q: Which directive binds a form control in template-driven forms?

options.exp: ngModel conecta el input con el modelo del formulario.

q: Reactive forms are built primarily using:

options.exp: Son la base de los reactive forms.

q: Which pipe converts objects to JSON format?

options.exp: json formatea objetos para visualización.

q: Which pipe allows partial display of strings or arrays?

options.exp: slice devuelve solo una parte del valor.

q: What does bootstrap property in NgModule define?

options.text: The root component to load at app startup
options.exp: bootstrap indica qué componente inicia la app.

q: Which symbol is used for property binding?

options.exp: [value] asigna propiedades dinámicamente.

q: What Angular feature helps build large-scale apps by splitting code?

options.exp: Los módulos organizan funcionalidad en bloques reutilizables.

q: What method of FormControl updates its value?

options.exp: setValue requiere un valor completo y válido.

q: Which Router Guard prevents leaving a route?

options.exp: Determina si una ruta puede abandonarse.

q: Which decorator turns a TypeScript class into a pipe?

options.exp: Define un pipe personalizado.

q: Which lifecycle hook runs once after component initialization?

options.exp: ngOnInit se usa para inicialización lógica.

q: Which lifecycle hook runs after input values change?

options.exp: ngOnChanges detecta cambios en @Input.

q: Which file loads the root component into the DOM?

options.exp: index.html contiene la etiqueta raíz donde se inyecta el app-root.

q: Which Angular CLI command updates dependencies automatically?

options.exp: ng update ayuda a mantener versiones actualizadas.

q: What does `standalone: true` mean when defining a component?

options.text: It does not need to belong to an NgModule
options.exp: Los standalone components eliminan la necesidad de módulos.

q: Which syntax imports a standalone component for use?

options.exp: Los standalone se incluyen en imports del componente que los usa.

q: Which operator cancels previous Observables when a new value arrives?

options.exp: switchMap descarta la suscripción anterior.

q: Which operator queues Observables and processes them in order?

options.exp: concatMap asegura el orden de emisión.

q: Which operator subscribes to all Observables simultaneously?

options.exp: mergeMap no garantiza orden; procesa paralelo.

q: Which Angular CLI command generates a directive?

options.exp: g d corresponde a generate directive.

q: Attribute directives typically:

options.text: Change appearance or behavior of an element
options.exp: No agregan ni remueven elementos, solo alteran atributos.

q: Which lifecycle hook is used to perform cleanup actions?

options.exp: Se ejecuta antes de destruir el componente.

q: What does '*ngIf="condition"' do?

options.text: Adds or removes the element from the DOM
options.exp: ngIf controla la representación en el DOM.

q: What command updates Angular to the latest stable version?

options.exp: ng update revisa y actualiza paquetes de Angular y dependencias compatibles.

q: Which file defines global project styling?

options.exp: styles.css se aplica globalmente a todos los componentes del proyecto.

q: Which part of Angular architecture is responsible for changing data displayed in templates?

options.exp: El change detection detecta cambios en datos y actualiza la vista automáticamente.

q: What symbol is used for property binding?

options.exp: [] se usa para enlazar atributos del DOM o inputs de componentes.

q: Two-way data binding in Angular uses:

options.exp: La sintaxis banana-in-a-box combina property + event binding: [(ngModel)].

q: Which decorator is used to emit events from a child component?

options.exp: @Output permite enviar eventos o datos hacia el componente padre.

q: Which binding listens for user input like click events?

options.exp: Event binding se realiza con (): (click)="handler()".

q: A component's HTML view is defined in which property?

options.exp: template define HTML inline y templateUrl carga un archivo externo.

q: Signals are meant to replace:

options.exp: Signals permiten reactividad sin depender de zonas ni recorrer todo el árbol de componentes.

q: Which method updates a signal based on its previous value?

options.exp: update(fn) recibe el valor anterior y retorna el nuevo.

q: Which TypeScript feature helps detect incorrect property access during development?

options.exp: El tipado estático evita errores comunes en tiempo de compilación.

q: Which TypeScript keyword defines a variable whose value cannot change?

options.exp: const define valores inmutables después de su asignación inicial.

q: How do you declare a typed array in TypeScript?

options.exp: number[] especifica que el arreglo solo contendrá números.

q: Where should a service typically be provided to be available application-wide?

options.exp: Usar @Injectable({ providedIn: 'root' }) hace el servicio global.

q: Attribute directives mainly:

options.text: Change appearance or behavior of elements
options.exp: Ej: ngClass y ngStyle modifican atributos visuales sin crear/remover elementos.

q: Structural directives mainly:

options.text: Add or remove elements in the DOM
options.exp: *ngIf, *ngFor alteran la estructura del DOM.

q: Which directive switches templates based on matching conditions?

options.exp: *ngSwitchCase se usa junto con ngSwitch para mostrar contenido condicional.

q: The DatePipe allows formatting dates by using:

options.exp: Ej: {{ today | date:'dd/MM/yyyy' }}.

q: In template-driven forms, form controls are mainly created using:

options.exp: ngModel conecta el formulario HTML con el modelo de datos.

q: Reactive forms rely on:

options.exp: Se definen mediante FormControl, FormGroup y FormArray.

q: AbstractControl represents:

options.text: The base class for all form controls
options.exp: FormControl, FormGroup y FormArray extienden AbstractControl.

q: Which class manages grouped form controls?

options.exp: FormGroup permite agrupar controles para validación conjunta.

q: Which Angular module is necessary for using ngIf and ngFor?

options.exp: CommonModule incluye directivas comunes como ngIf y ngFor.

q: What is the main purpose of RouterModule?

options.exp: RouterModule gestiona rutas, navegación y carga de vistas.
